About Me

Allow me to introduce myself and provide insight into my endeavors.

Your project is in safe hands

I am a self-taught web developer and have been programming since 2018. My journey began with a bootcamp called YearUp Greater Atlanta, where I learned HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and SQL. Subsequently, I secured a six-month internship at Equifax. Later, I graduated from Kennesaw State University with a Bachelor of Science in Information Technology. To enhance my programming skills, I consistently work on various projects. During my leisure time, I enjoy watching anime, reading, playing video games, and listening to music.
